gov.llnl.ontology.wordnet
Interface OntologyWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
WordNetCorpusWriter
public interface OntologyWriter

An interface for saving a Wordnet ontology in a unique format. Each OntologyWriter implementation should specify it's serialized format.

Author:
Keith Stevens

Method Summary
 void saveOntology(OntologyReader reader, String outputDir)
          Saves all of the Synsets mapped by reader into dictionary files based in the directory designated by outputDir.
 

Method Detail

saveOntology

                  String outputDir)
Saves all of the Synsets mapped by reader into dictionary files based in the directory designated by outputDir.
